messages.text: Hello User, I am your personal emotional financial advisor.
I notice you're moving quickly through decisions. Sometimes our best insights come when we pause. Take a breath. What's driving this urgency?
Main notice kar raha hun ki aap bohot fast decisions le rahe hain. Sometimes jab hum pause karte hain toh better insights milte hain. Deep breath lo. Ye urgency kya drive kar rahi hai?
I notice you're moving quickly through decisions. Sometimes our best insights come when we pause. Take a breath. What's driving this urgency?
